name: Cisco Identity Services Engine路径遍历漏洞（CNVD-2025-06671）
description: Cisco Identity Services Engine是美国思科公司的一款环境感知平台。Cisco Identity Services Engine存在路径遍历漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞读取或删除任意文件。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网:
https://sec.cloudapps.cisco.com/security/center/content/CiscoSecurityAdvisory/cisco-sa-ise-multi-vuln-DBQdWRy
patch: Cisco Identity Services Engine路径遍历漏洞（CNVD-2025-06671）的补丁
